Reviews.Title: Verizon Convoy Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: Sandra Spencer
Reviews.Content: The phone came sooner than expected and was brand new as advertised.The price was 2/3 less than purchasing it from Verizon and did not require any contract.I would recommend purchasing new or used phones from Amazon rather than replacing your phone through Verizon or any authorized retailer.

Reviews.Title: Came as described
Reviews.Author: Crossyedlisper
Reviews.Content: Basic phone that works appropriately! Bought for my dad he likes no frill phones that are easy to use, this does that perfectly!
